body.name: ANDFZ Smart Watch (Receive & Dial), Newest 1.85" TFT HD Display Smart Watch, Smart Watch for Android Phones with Pedometer, SMS Reminder, AI Voice, Android Smart Watch for Women Men

features: 【Answer/Make Calls and Message Notifications】After connecting to Bluetooth, you can directly dial the phone number on the watch to answer the call, and you can synchronize the address book and call records. Thanks to the built-in microphone and speaker, you can answer/make/reject calls (and also play music) on the spot from your wrist, allowing you to exercise hands-free and smarter than any other watch in its class. Can receive SMS and APP messages (Note: cannot reply to messages).

【Newest 1.85" Large Screen & Multiple Faces】Using the latest Technology, this smart watch for android ios phone is equipped with a 1.85 inch 240x286 ultra-clear full touch color screen, which makes men's women's fitness watch more fashionable and durable. We have carefully designed a beautiful UI and multi-dial faces for you, so that you can switch the dial style through the App at any time according to your mood and occasion.

【Reading Information Notifications】The smart watch can receive text messages and real-time reminder notifications from apps, such as WhatsAPP /Text /Facebook /Twitter /Message. It is convenient for you to view information while you are busy at work. (Reminder: You can only receive reminders for messages and app messages, but you cannot reply to messages).

【24-Hour Health Monitoring/Multiple Sports Modes】The upgraded smart watch gives you 24-hour real-time heart rate and records all-day activities such as steps, calories burned, miles walked, minutes of activity. It also supports multiple exercise modes and tracks all your workout distances and fitness during exercise. Learn more about your health!

【Smartwatch Compatibility for Android iOS Phones】The smartwatch is compatible with iOS 9.0 and above or Android 4.0 and above smartphones. With Ai voice assistant, SMS notification reminder, music playback, multiple sports monitoring, female physiological monitoring and reminder, weather forecast, IP67 waterproof life, remote control photography, sedentary reminder, calculator, alarm, stopwatch, timer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Watch for the Price
reviews.reviewText: This is my first smartwatch. I wanted an Apple watch but i didn't want to spend the money. I just needed something to track my steps, show my messages, take a call...track my sleep patterns. I found this watch after much searching and research. First of all the watch fits nicely. The screen is big and easy to read. The watch band is made from soft silicone and it is comfortable. It paired right away with my iPhone 8. No issue whatsoever. You can take calls from your watch, and you can ready text messages, however, you can't reply to texts... but you can make a call! I also like the different faces that you can download from the website. I also like that you can add your own. Again, very simple to use. I promise if you are looking for something simple and easy to use, and won't break the bank, this is your watch! The blood pressure was an added bonus for me plus the blood oxygen levels. Overall, without going into a lot of details, I loved this watch. It is a great buy and comes with so many helpful details. SmartWatches have come a long way, nowadays, you can get one for under $100.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price and looks..
reviews.reviewText: I have like 4 different smart watches. 2 I don't like and don't wear anymore. I have an elegant one that is dinty and pretty to wear for going out. Now, this smart watch is AMAZING!!! I wear it all the time. I got it for work but the only time I take it off is to shower or clean the kitchen. It does everything it says it does. It's simple to connect to your phone. The speaker for the phone is clear. Text messages and phone calls come through without any problems. The band is pretty, the screen is large enough to read but not too big to make it look silly. I've had many compliments on my watch. This is the most worn watch I have. Looking for a new smart watch....look no further cause this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this watch! I have had this watch for about 3 weeks now and I love everything about it! I especially love that it can track my sleep and deep sleep! The blue tooth works really well and the speaker volume on the watch itself is the perfect volume to listen to my music. You can make calls and get your notifications on here from text to Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat and more! I love the band color and there’s different little backgrounds and I found the perfect one for me! It has good battery life, charges relatively fast. I definitely recommend this watch!UPDATE:I forgot to take my watch off before I got into the shower and panicked when I realized that I had it on. This watch was drenched but low and behold it held up and still works like a champ!! If you’re thinking about buying a smart watch look no further!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality watch
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical that this watch would be of good quality for the price but I love it! It does everything that a high dollar watch would do other than texting. It tracks your steps, blood pressure, heart rate etc. the battery life is great. I can use for 2-3 days before charging. If your looking for a smart watch at a good price don’t hesitate to purchase this watch you won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good watch but doesn’t sync with Apple health.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch in June do to a project at a stadium and I wanted to track my steps. This watch replaced an older watch, but, Apple doesn’t retrieve the data from the Andfz app, so, if you want that, look elsewhere. If it is capable, someone let me know how. The other app has been deleted for quite awhile and this one does not show up in its place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch, great price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this watch for my wife to help monitor her blood pressure and heart rate. Happy to say it's pretty accurate to what her readings were when she visited the clinic. The only thing she has a problem with is the sleep tracking. It said she had slept and she definitely hadn't slept due to illness keeping her up. Otherwise she really loves this watch. It was easy for her to connect with the app and she loves that she can personalize the watch face with her own photos (see pic). She can go a week without having to charge it as well. Overall, we're very happy with the watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s not you it’s me.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t exercise so I really didn’t need it for that. And after ordering I also realized I just don’t like wearing a watch anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this watch. I had a samsung active and it does not compare to this watch.. the battery alone last more than a week.. its small.. not big and bulky.. very comfortable fit. It does EVERYTHING the Samsung watch does. 10/10 would buy again.
